Class Message

java.lang.Object
Message
public class Message extends Object
Template class for all messages sent between two Users. Stores elementary details about a message.

  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      public Message(String messageString)
      Parses a Message object's String and converts it into a Message object. Used while reading Message(s) from memory. Inherently calls User(String userString, boolean hasDetails)
      Parameters:
      messageString - A Message String
      See Also:
      • Message toString()

    • Message

      public Message(String message, User sender, User recipient)
      Creates a new Message object with provided parameters. Used when creating a new Message before appending or writing to a conversation file.
      Parameters:
      message - The content of the message. Taken from the active user's input
      sender - The sender (active user) of the message
      recipient - The recipient of the message. Taken from the Conversation depending on the active user's role

  • Method Details

      Accessor method for String TIMESTAMP
      Returns:
      Returns the message's timestamp

      Accessor method for User RECIPIENT
      Returns:

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Accessor method for String message
      Returns:
      Returns the message's content

    • getCensoredMessage

      public String getCensoredMessage(User user)
      Customized (as per parameter user) accessor method for String message to implement censoring.
      Parameters:
      user - The user viewing a Conversation
      Returns:
      Returns the message's content according to the parameter user's censorship settings

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage(String message)
      Mutator method for String message.
      Parameters:
      message - The new message content. Used during editing.

    • isSenderVisibility

      public boolean isSenderVisibility()
      Accessor method for boolean senderVisibility
      Returns:
      Returns the visibility of the message by the sender.

    • setSenderVisibility

      public void setSenderVisibility(boolean senderVisibility)
      Mutator method for boolean senderVisibility.
      Parameters:
      senderVisibility - The new visibility status. Used during deleting.

    • isRecipientVisibility

      public boolean isRecipientVisibility()
      Accessor method for boolean recipientVisibility
      Returns:
      Returns the visibility of the message by the recipientVisibility.

    • setRecipientVisibility

      public void setRecipientVisibility(boolean recipientVisibility)
      Mutator method for boolean recipientVisibility.
      Parameters:
      recipientVisibility - The new visibility status. Used during deleting.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a formatted String of the Message containing all details.

      General format:
      Message<timeStamp, id, sender.toString(), recipient.toString(), message, senderVisibility, recipientVisibility>
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Returns the Message object's String

    • csvToString

      public String csvToString()
      Generates a formatted String of the Message containing only the required details for CSV conversion. (i.e. does not contain sensitive information like passwords)

      General format:
      timeStamp, id, sender.csvToString(), recipient.csvToString(), message, senderVisibility, recipientVisibility
      Returns:
      Returns the Message object's String for CSV conversion
